name: SPITOON64
description:
YEEEEHAW. A rework of an earlier game I made set in the west. Try to richochet your blue spit to all green objects (bottles/cacti/dollar dollar bill yall) but avoid the reds.

For the lo rez jam using PIX64 console; open PIX64 and navigate to  SPITOON64)

I'm trying to make more prototypes for game jam to see which ones (if any) you think could be turned into a fun multilevel game leave comments/feedback! Thanks.
